general.descriptionTextModule: Module to import data from Shopware 5

introduction.contentTitle: Launch Shopware Playground with your own data.
introduction.contentInformation: Import your data from Shopware 5 to Shopware Playground and create your own experiments. Explore the possibilities of Shopware Playground with real data.

pluginInformation.contentInformation: Use your access data to log in to the Shopware 5 backend and open the plugin manager. To get started, download and activate the free plugin “Shopware Playground Connector”.

credentials.emptyState: Sorry no form for selected profile found.

api.contentInformation: The API key can be found in the administration of your user data. Please activate the API access, copy the API key to your clipboard and confirm by clicking “Save”.

success.contentInformation: Click on “Finish” and select the data sets to be transferred in the import module. The data can be imported completely, step by step or subsequently.
success.undefinedErrorMsg: An unknown error occurred while checking the SSL certificate from the specified shop domain.
success.connectionInsecureMsg: The SSL certificate of the given shop domain is not secure. We recommend you to check the certificate for your own security.

error.contentInformation: Unfortunately, the connection could not be established. Please refer to the error messages and try again.
error.connectionErrorMsg: Could not connect to the server. Please check the given shop domain.
error.authenticationErrorMsg: Your credentials are incorrect. Please check them and try again.
error.undefinedErrorMsg: Internal server error. Please try again.

index.title: Data import
index.browserClosingHint: Do you really want to abort the data import?

selectDataCard.hint: The selected data is being transferred with language information and has relevant dependencies that are necessary for the integrity of the data import.
selectDataCard.infoTitle: About the new catalogues and sales channels
selectDataCard.infoText: Catalogues and sales channels are new elements for Shopware Playground that help you to structure your data without sub- and language shops. For more information on this topic, we recommend the articles in our documentation on catalogues and sales channels.
selectDataCard.noData: No data was found to import.
selectDataCard.gdprText: The general terms of use of Shopware Playground applys to the import of data. The import process does not affect the data of the source system.
selectDataCard.pluginVersionText: Please make sure your Shopware 5 backend is using the latest version of the Shopware Playground Connector Plugin.

loadingScreenCard.hint: Please remain logged in and do not delete any data in the other shop system until the process is complete. You can work in the system, the process continues in the background.

success.title: Done
success.hintContent: From now on, you can discover our experiments or simply develop one yourself with your own data.

warning.title: Done
warning.hintContent: The import could not be completed properly. Imported data may be incorrect or incomplete.
warning.warningListTitle: No error occurred | The following error occurred | The following errors occurred

failure.title: Failed
failure.hintContent: The migration could not be completed.

pauseScreen.title: Pause
pauseScreen.message:
The import was paused.
Continue it or abort the process.

takeoverScreen.message: The import is already active on another device or browser.
takeoverScreen.hint: An import is already active, but you don't have access to it? Here, you can

takeoverModal.title: Take over import
takeoverModal.message: Note that taking over an active import will revoke the administration rights from the original user as well.
takeoverModal.hint: Do you want to stop the active import here and take it over?

takeoverInfoScreen.message: Your active import has been stopped and taken over by another device or browser.

confirmDialog.title: Data import
confirmDialog.message: Do you really want to import your data?

confirmAbortDialog.title: Data import
confirmAbortDialog.hintContent: When the process is finished, the data is not complete and therefore partially unusable.

authorizationError.information: Authorization Error. Your access data is not correct. Please check it and try again.

canNotConnectToServer.title: No connection
canNotConnectToServer.information: No connection to server. Please check the connection for issues.

customerExists.information: Customer with email "{mail}" already exists. You cannot add this user with that e-mail to your database.

migrationContextPropertyMissing.information: Required property "{notFoundProperty}" for import context not found.

migrationsWorkloadPropertyMissing.information: Required property "{notFoundProperty}" for import workload not found.

noFileSystemPermissions.information: No file system permissions to create or write files or directories. Please check your permissions.

undefinedIndex.title: Unidentified index
undefinedIndex.information: Index "{unidentifiedIndex}" could not be found. Please check your data.

error.unknownError: Unknown error. For more information, you can check the console logs of the developer tools in your browser.
error.SWAG-MIGRATION-WRITER-NOT-FOUND: File writer for "{entity}" entity not found.
error.SWAG-MIGRATION-SHOPWARE55-PARENT-ENTITY-: Parent entity for "{entity}" child not found.
error.SWAG-MIGRATION-SHOPWARE55-ASSOCIATION-RE: Mapping of "{missingEntity}" is missing, but it is a required association for "{requiredFor}". Please import "{missingImportEntity}" first to continue.
error.SWAG-MIGRATION-SHOPWARE55-EMPTY-NECESSAR: {entity} entity could not be converted, because of empty, necessary field(s): {fields}.
error.SWAG-MIGRATION-SHOPWARE55-NO-DEFAULT-SHI: Default shipping address of customer is empty and will be set with the default billing address.
error.SWAG-MIGRATION-SHOPWARE55-NO-DEFAULT-BIL: Default billing address of customer is empty and will be set with the default shipping address.
Default billing and shipping address of customer are empty and will be set with the first address.
error.SWAG-MIGRATION-SHOPWARE55-PRODUCT-MEDIA-: Product media could not be converted.
error.SWAG-MIGRATION-SHOPWARE55-EMPTY-LOCALE: Category entity could not be converted, because of empty locale.
error.SWAG-MIGRATION-SHOPWARE55-NO-ADDRESS-DAT: Category entity could not be converted, because of empty locale.
error.SWAG-MIGRATION-SHOPWARE55-NOT-CONVERT-AB: Translation of object type “{objectType}“ could not be converted.
error.SWAG-MIGRATION-SHOPWARE55-INVALID-UNSERI: {entity} translation entity could not be converted, because of invalid, unserialized object data.
